title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 5.6 - Other discovery
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 5.6 - Other discovery

State Regulations

The presiding officer, on request or by his or her own
motion, may authorize other forms of discovery, including oral depositions and
inspection of sites, facilities, or original documents. A party requesting such
procedures shall show that the likely benefits cannot otherwise be obtained and
outweigh the associated costs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
5.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
